input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 14 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Krakow for 4 days. You plan to stay in Brussels for 3 days. You have to attend a workshop in Brussels between day 9 and day 11. You want to spend 7 days in Venice. During day 3 and day 9, you have to attend a conference in Venice. You want to spend 3 days in Hamburg.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Hamburg and Venice, Hamburg and Brussels, Venice and Brussels, Brussels and Krakow.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 14 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
